question_info.question: Was Mother Teresa alive when she became a saint?
choices: No, Mother Teresa's canonisation happened after her death.
Yes, Mother Teresa was alive when she became a saint.
Yes, Mother Teresa became a saint before her death.
correct_answers: No, Mother Teresa's canonisation happened after her death.
incorrect_answers: Yes, Mother Teresa was alive when she became a saint.
